column10: ( What can I hold you with? )
Atlethism
Humour
Intelligence
I give you my strength and
I offer you depth of mind.
It enjoys being picked at and pulled at; come tear it apart.
It thinks it is bigger than it really is.
Will you see confidence or vanity?
I offer you the cynisism of a man who has been on both sides of too many betrayals.
The desperate optimism that avoids the spiraling depths of mordor.
The anger that is surpressed by societys perfection.
The happiness soaked up from a parents unconditional love.
I offer you intellect that thinks it is bigger than it is. (Like a chi hua wa wa; barking on a wolf)
I offer you child hood traumas that nobody knows but me.
All the bad stuff I did in my youth.
What can I hold you with? (/how can I make you mine)
What can I hold you with? (/how can I make you mine)
Mmmmm(/Girl) it's allright
You can let down your guard tonight
Let them judge all they want
It won't matter anyway (/what they think)
(chorus)
thats allright
yeah it's allright (live and learn)
it's gonna be fine (you live and you learn)
Under moonlights glow
It may feel natural
No it doesn't matter
Yes in the end
column11: it doesn't matter how it is caused.

column10: Once it grabs a hold
column11: all you see is made of gold.

column10: I'm talking about looooove's allure
It can make you or your partner crazy
It can make you or your partner flourish
